    X.sort(reverse=True)
    Y.sort(reverse=True)
    i = 1
    j = 0
    a = 1
    b = 1

            i = i + 1
    if i == M - 1:
        while j < N - 1:
            cost = cost + Y[j] * a
            j = j + 1
    return cost
